title: Dead Air
description: Popular Clarion, Indiana radio talk show host Wes Bryan is alarmed when nine-year-old Jennifer calls into his show, "Talk About Town." She can't tell him where she is, she can't tell him who is hurting her, but the fear in Jennifer's voice is unmistakable, and Wes is compelled by nearly forgotten convictions to discover who is abusing this child.and why.
author: Bob Larson
